title: Sound and Rhythm Perception Assessment Application for Children with Hearing Impairments

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary special education principles and digital content development experience
context.additional_context: Cultivating the ability to design sound/rhythm perception assessment tools for hearing-impaired children through ADDIE model-based application development practice.

learning_goals: They can design an educational application prototype by applying the five stages of the ADDIE model (Analysis-Design-Development-Implementation-Evaluation)
They can develop three or more sound/rhythm assessment contents suitable for the cognitive characteristics of hearing-impaired children
They can submit application improvement plans incorporating expert feedback in an LMS environment
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
